name: 東方兎闘 ~ Crescent Incursion
description:
Touhou meets Fire Emblem! Help Momiji command a ragtag army of Youkai to battle against the attacking rabbits.

FEATURING:

  • A full chapter of tactical action.
  • A new story that happens parallel to Touhou canon.
  • A fusion of 2D and 3D graphics.
  • Fire Emblem-styled remixes of Touhou songs.
  • English and Japanese language options.
  • A lot of bunnies.
  • (Oh also Takane's a healer)

CONTROLS:

wasd/arrows: move camera or selected character
left click/enter/space: advance, select
right click/esc/q: back, deselect
shift: aim attack (While holding down shift, you can use the arrow keys to choose a target)

CREDITS:

Bakaretsu - 2d art
Bread Man - 3d support
Luyuu - chillin
